tool_description: An api for news about crypto from around the world
name: All about Crypto
title: All about Crypto

api_list.name: Get news from specific resource
api_list.description: This endpoint returns the news from specific resource
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://all-about-crypto.p.rapidapi.com/news/coindesk"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "all-about-crypto.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://all-about-crypto.p.rapidapi.com/news/{itemid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "all-about-crypto.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all the news about Cryptocoins
api_list.description: This endpoind will return back all news about cryptocoins.
